decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Site Location Plan received 11th March, J_001 received 16th February 2015; 2196/01, J_002 received 9th March 2015 and Noise Assessment received 15th June) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 2 - The rating level of sound emitted from fixed mechanical plant at the premises shall not exceed 65LAeq,8 dB one metre from the facade of any adjacent office space. All measurements shall be made in accordance with the methodology contained within BS4142:2014.
Where access to any adjacent office space is not possible measurements shall be undertaken at an appropriate location and corrected to establish the noise levels at the nearest noise sensitive property.
description: Retrospective application for the erection of a commercial dust extractor
